author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Coimbatore and The Nilgiris units of the Bharatiya Janata Party interviewed party men who expressed willingness to contest elections.

According to sources, a team led by State General Secretary Mohanrajulu interviewed 306 party men asking about their association with the party, their position and details of their contribution.

The team would forward the names to the State office-bearers for selection, the sources added.
title: Polls: BJP interviews party men
